title: 白宮聯署要求Trump哥解放香港

replies.msg:
得閒撳下，睇下之後點

https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/president-trump-please-liberate-hong-kong-communist-chinas-occupation?fbclid=IwAR0eD7ytTjSwdRl9nMEybLp6Xr5bFVg0qDkq5-YrdhsVKvQ8XvSZL5BW9iU

利申：唔係我整嘅

We need President Trump to save us. Only President Trump can save us. Hong Kong is dying. Hong Kong is suffering from Communist occupation. The communists want to grab Hong Kong people and move us back to China and throw us into prisons and torture us. Please bring this message to President Trump. People of Hong Kong will be grateful to you.

小學雞文筆

唔洗寫咁深，清晰表達就夠
特朗普自己講既英文都係好淺白

依家都係太少人簽啦
推
寫到乞人幫你咁
